summary: Follower that uses unrelenting force shout.
descriptionHtml:
Azula the Ancient Nord.

no read me file, so read entire description.

REQUIRES  ApachiSkyHair

 A follower that can auto use Unrelenting Force Shout (when she feels like it).  Combat style is swords in both hands and will use shout.  Level 10 to 150. Uses Heavy Armor. Comes w/ 2 swords, and ancient nord armor.

Find her in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.  Do a clean save in the bannered mare in white run before installing mod to be sure she will spawn there.

When the player equips a weapon She will start off with a single sword in hand, then will equip  another automaticly when fighting.
Mods used in screenshots....
Eyes of Beauty
Better Females by Bella  less make up version.
She uses CBBE curvy  by Caliente.

If you are using a different body mod other than cbbe curvy, you may get a grey face.
If so, it can be fixed by opening console, mouse click on her, type \"setnpcweight 100\" without quotation marks, exit console, fixed.

Post some screenshots in the image section if you change her armor :)

Should not conflict w/ any other mods. 

Made with Skyrim NPC Editor.
author: rappinhvac
